#summary Description and instructions for GSRf reconciliation application.

= GSRf =

JPrIME-GSRf is a phylogenetic application for reconciling a guest tree and a host tree by means of duplication events and loss events. It relies on Bayesian inference of model parameters using an MCMC framework.
